name: aether-native-browser
description: AETHER - Native Chromium AI-First Browser with Fellou.ai-level capabilities

scripts.start: concurrently "yarn --cwd backend start" "yarn --cwd frontend start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
scripts.start-desktop: concurrently "yarn --cwd backend start" "yarn --cwd frontend start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn electron-dev"
scripts.install-all: yarn install && yarn --cwd backend install && yarn --cwd frontend install
scripts.build-all: yarn --cwd backend build && yarn --cwd frontend build
